Plotting¶

Introduction¶

Hello World

Created on:Thu May 17 16:56:35 2012
author:Stuart Mumford

Library for doing 2D slices and animations of SAC / VAC output

Class to hold drawing routines for any type of image, line etc.

fieldlines(v1, v2, seeds, dS=1)[source]¶

Simple Euler fieldline integrator v1,v2 - y and x vectors seeds - array of coordinate (array indexes) pairs dS [optional] - step size

get_subplot_extent(subplot)[source]¶

plot(i)[source]¶

Reads data, and plots requested subplots. Last routine to call.

seed_generator(ax, density, dS)[source]¶

Generate the fieldline seeds

ax -Int (1,2,3,4) (top,bottom,left,right) - Side of grid to seed field lines density - Int (0-ng)- Field line density in grid points dS - Step size for fieldline calculation
